summary_message: A negative status on your credit account can result in a low CIBIL score and difficulty in getting a loan when required.

summary_content.content_title: How does negative status affect your score?
summary_content.content_description: Negative status is a result of missing payments on your accounts that can impact your CIBIL score and affect your ability to get the best offers on loans and credit cards.

related_page.page_content: Check how clearing dues against accounts with negative status can impact your CIBIL score.
